results:
Based on the search results, here's information about "The Peasants" (2023), Poland's Oscar submission, and its international distribution:

## Film Overview
"The Peasants" is an animated feature drama that Poland submitted for Best International Feature Film at the 96th Academy Awards. The film is directed and written by DK Welchman and Hugh Welchman, and is an adaptation of Władysław Reymont's novel of the same name, produced using the painted animation technique similar to their previous film, "Loving Vincent".

## Oscar Submission Details
Poland's Oscar entry choice was made by a selection committee overseen by the Polish Film Institute. The decision was made on the basis of four votes in favor and two against, with the committee choosing "The Peasants" for the way the co-directors had further pushed the boundaries of animation. The picture will also compete in the Oscar Best Animation category.

## International Distribution
The film has achieved extensive international distribution:

**Sales Territories**: New Europe Film Sales has sold rights to "The Peasants" to more than 70 countries, including German-speaking Europe (Plaion), France (The Jokers), Benelux (Paradiso), South Korea (First Run), China (JL Film), Scandinavia (Another World Entertainment) and Spain (Karma), as well as North America, Latin America, the Middle East and Australia/New Zealand (Sony Pictures Classics).

**North American Distribution**: In September 2023, Sony Pictures Classics acquired distribution rights to the film for North and Latin America, the Middle East, Australia and New Zealand. In United States, it was released for a one-week awards-qualifying run beginning 8 December 2023 in New York City and Los Angeles, followed by a limited theatrical release starting on 26 January 2024.

## Festival Circuit and Reception
The film premiered as a Special Presentation at Toronto Film Festival, and has since played at the Polish Film Festival in Gdynia, where it won the Special Jury Prize and Audience Award, and is headed to the London Film Festival, where its sessions October 11-12 have already sold out. The film will also play at the Hamptons and Busan festivals.

## Box Office Performance
With over 141,000 admissions "The Peasants" recorded the biggest opening weekend for a Polish film in 2023, and by 30 October 2023 the number of recorded admissions rose to above 750,000 making the movie the most popular Polish release of 2023.
